content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for this 25-square-meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also offers a good value for the money. I would consider a fair price to be around 600 Euros per month, all inclusive. This would include the cost of utilities and any other fees. Is this something that you could offer?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Ryanah, your consideration for a fair price is appreciated. I understand that you're looking for a balance of comfort and value. Regarding your offer of 600 Euros per month, all inclusive, I'm sorry, but I cannot meet that price. However, I'm willing to negotiate. What would be your next best offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Heine. As a student, I'm on a budget, so I'm looking for the best deal possible. My next best offer would be 550 Euros per month, all inclusive. This would be a significant savings for me, and I believe it's a fair price for the apartment's size and location. Would you be able to consider this offer?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Ryanah, your offer of 550 Euros per month, all inclusive, is more in line with what I can consider. It's still lower than my initial expectations, but given your circumstances as a student, I'm willing to make an exception. I can agree to your offer of 550 Euros per month, all inclusive. Please note that this is a special rate for students, and it includes all utility costs. Would you like to proceed with this agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
